content: While we can’t police against that, our main use case is portrait paintings. Probably 70% are portraits of humans, 20% pets, and 10% are landscapes. They’re pretty much all the customer’s own photos from their phones. We have no association with Instagram, or their photo sharing service. We definitely don’t advertise that we replicate other artist’s works, and certainly don’t encourage it. We actually rarely even get people getting classical replicas (Mona Lisa, etc). Even
